title: Localization of Gravitino on a Brane
abstract: We show how the spin 3/2 gravitino field can be localized on a brane in a general framework of supergravity theory. Provided that a scalar field coupled to the Rarita-Schwinger field develops an vacuum expectation value (VEV) whose phase depends on the 'radial' coordinate in extra internal space, the gravitino is localized on a brane with the exponentially decreasing warp factor by selecting an appropriate value of the VEV.
